name: Little Star Lover
description:
Little Star Lover, there are many sad people out there. Whether they know it or not, they need your help and your hugs. Bring Love to a lonely galaxy in this short adventure game.

Controls:
WASD: Movement
Shift: Sprint
Space: Interact
Mouse Click: Progress Dialog
When you have finished a "mission" the bus stop sign will activate and when you walk near it, it will beam you to the next planet.

Made by:

Isaac La Russa: Story, Models, Textures, 2D Sprites, Animations, Music

Hadley Richardson-O'Brien: Programming, Textures

Zucchini: 4th Planet Music

Made for Magical Girl Jam #6
